ygData.msgSnippet: Beserk turned his body to the two drones. He snarled at their presence. He took two steps towards them, his clawed hands clentched. He watched their movements

Beserk turned his body to the two drones. He snarled at their 
presence. He took two steps towards them, his clawed hands clentched. 
He watched their movements and looked at their weapons. His was 
missing so that gave him another reason to be defensive. He charged 
at the one on the left, striking his razor sharp claws at it's chest.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Blazer::
> 
> Blazer nods. "Allright."
> 
> He tuns around, motioning the two droids to enter Berserk's cell. 
They do so, 
> a blaster in each one's left hand, and a sword in the right.
